trans-unit.source: Provides the functionality to validate a workflow.
trans-unit.target: 提供验证工作流的功能。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the workflow activity with the specified ID in the specified workflow.
trans-unit.target: 检索与指定的工作流中的指定 ID 的工作流活动。

trans-unit.source: The root workflow activity that contains the activity element to access.
trans-unit.target: 包含要访问的活动元素的根工作流活动。

trans-unit.source: An identifier that is associated with an activity.
trans-unit.target: 与活动关联的标识符。

trans-unit.source: A workflow activity.
trans-unit.target: 工作流活动。

trans-unit.source: Verifies that a workflow activity is correctly configured according to the validation logic.
trans-unit.target: 验证工作流活动已依据验证逻辑正确配置。

trans-unit.source: This logic can be the <xref:System.Activities.CodeActivity.CacheMetadata*> method of the activities to validate, or build and policy constraints.
trans-unit.target: 此逻辑可以<xref:System.Activities.CodeActivity.CacheMetadata*>方法的活动验证，或生成和策略约束。</xref:System.Activities.CodeActivity.CacheMetadata*>

trans-unit.source: Custom activity authors can provide validation logic in an activity's <xref:System.Activities.CodeActivity.CacheMetadata%2A> override.
trans-unit.target: 自定义活动作者可以提供在活动的验证逻辑<xref:System.Activities.CodeActivity.CacheMetadata%2A>重写。</xref:System.Activities.CodeActivity.CacheMetadata%2A>

trans-unit.source: Any exceptions that are thrown from <xref:System.Activities.CodeActivity.CacheMetadata%2A> are not treated as validation errors.
trans-unit.target: 引发的任何异常<xref:System.Activities.CodeActivity.CacheMetadata%2A>不会视为验证错误。</xref:System.Activities.CodeActivity.CacheMetadata%2A>

trans-unit.source: These exceptions will escape from the call to Validate and must be handled by the caller.
trans-unit.target: 这些异常将从对验证的调用中转义，并且必须由调用方进行处理。

trans-unit.source: An element from a workflow activity tree.
trans-unit.target: 工作流活动树中的元素。

trans-unit.source: A collection of validation errors, each of which can contain the name of the validated activity, a descriptive message, an error code, and other information.
trans-unit.target: 验证错误的集合，其中每个可包含验证的活动、 描述性消息、 错误代码和其他信息的名称。

trans-unit.source: Verifies that a workflow activity is correctly configured according to the validation logic.
trans-unit.target: 验证工作流活动已依据验证逻辑正确配置。

trans-unit.source: This logic can be the cacheMetadata method of the activities to validate, or build and policy constraints.
trans-unit.target: 此逻辑可以是活动验证，或生成和策略约束的 cacheMetadata 方法。

trans-unit.source: Custom activity authors can provide validation logic in an activity's <xref:System.Activities.CodeActivity.CacheMetadata%2A> override.
trans-unit.target: 自定义活动作者可以提供在活动的验证逻辑<xref:System.Activities.CodeActivity.CacheMetadata%2A>重写。</xref:System.Activities.CodeActivity.CacheMetadata%2A>

trans-unit.source: Any exceptions that are thrown from <xref:System.Activities.CodeActivity.CacheMetadata%2A> are not treated as validation errors.
trans-unit.target: 引发的任何异常<xref:System.Activities.CodeActivity.CacheMetadata%2A>不会视为验证错误。</xref:System.Activities.CodeActivity.CacheMetadata%2A>

trans-unit.source: These exceptions will escape from the call to <xref:System.Activities.Validation.ActivityValidationServices.Validate%2A> and must be handled by the caller.
trans-unit.target: 这些异常将从调用中转义<xref:System.Activities.Validation.ActivityValidationServices.Validate%2A>并且必须由调用方进行处理。</xref:System.Activities.Validation.ActivityValidationServices.Validate%2A>

trans-unit.source: An activity from a workflow activity tree.
trans-unit.target: 工作流活动树中的活动。

trans-unit.source: An object that determines the behavior of the validation method on the workflow , can suppress the internal validation logic, and can also contain the policy constraints.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象，确定工作流上验证方法的行为可以取消内部验证逻辑，并且还可以包含策略约束。

trans-unit.source: A collection of validation errors, each of which can contain the name of the activity that is configured incorrectly, a descriptive message, an error or warning code , and other information.
trans-unit.target: 验证错误的集合，其中每个可包含的配置不正确的活动、 描述性消息、 错误或警告代码和其他信息的名称。
